Battery test reads "0%" with PA connected - no battery hooked up.  With battery only hooked up, unit reads "XX%", or the correct battery charge percentage.

On 243B762:C main boards with an EEPROM 169G743-71 installed, this is OK.  All other board versions, to my knowledge, read 100% with PA only hooked up, no battery.  Could not find documentation to support this, but it is written this way in the Production
